rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes contribution using neutral language ('So can farm workers having contact').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual information (spread mechanism) but contains no explicit calming cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes how the virus spreads, not capabilities or preparedness.
